thread.title: Bloomberg pledges $4.5 million to help U.S. fulfill Paris accord

title: Bloomberg pledges $4.5 million to help U.S. fulfill Paris accord
text:
Bloomberg pledges $4.5 million to help U.S. fulfill Paris accord 4:12am EDT - 01:22 
Former New York City Mayor Michael Bloomberg said on Sunday he will write a check for $4.5 million to fulfill the United States' commitment to the Paris climate accord. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Former New York City Mayor Michael Bloomberg said on Sunday he will write a check for $4.5 million to fulfill the United States' commitment to the Paris climate accord.
